name: Build Way 3D Arcade retro cube runner puzzle game
name_original: Build Way 3D Arcade retro cube runner puzzle game
description:
Hi all! We have a long-awaited release of the mobile game !!! We Finished our "indie" project , went through all the stages from the idea and sketches to the final product with release to Google Play. We used unity 3d. The development took place in his spare time and lasted more than 1.5 years. What result - you decide! We will be glad your feedback and ratings. Download the app - play, atmospheric puzzle in 3D. The project has worked 3 experienced developers in gamedev. 2 programmers and 3d / 2d artist. What your think about our game? Can you advise something to improve?

Love simple and at the same time logically interesting games? Then our app will not leave you indifferent! Dynamic levels, ever-increasing complexity, colorful and exciting locations will not let you get bored and relax! Go in search of new cubes and exciting options for building your way! Collect the keys to get a decent reward for completing the level from the chest! Do not pass by the coin - they will help you ease the gameplay! Complete all the levels and show that you deserve the main reward, only the most enduring can do it! 

Your path begins here and now!
How to play?
Open the cube blocks on the wall to lead the way to your main cube.
Avoid bombs on your way.
Detonate bombs using the gamecube.

Features:
Wonderful 3D animation along with affordable gameplay.
Nevertheless, it is quite swift runner who will not let you relax. 
Complete all levels and try to get the main reward at the end of the path.
Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere.
Collect coins and open all the original cubes, find the most attractive for you.
Beware of bombs - detonate them with the help of the game cube and avoid a deadly collision.

What do you choose, easy win or hard work?!
Only you decide how to build your way!
